description:
We went hands on for several hours with Dragon Age: The Veilguard. Make sure to check out our preview video for our thoughts on the experience with the game, but here, we’re going to break down 32 cool things we found in Dragon Age: The Veilguard so far. To note, some light spoilers for the early hours of the game.

Timestamps: 
00:00 - Intro
00:24 - Character customization
00:58 - Movement and combat
01:53 - Codex
02:07 - Skill tree
02:13 - The Lighthouse
02:22 - Valuables
02:29 - Companion abilities
03:02 - Factions
03:19 - Workshop
03:35 - Companion relationships
03:56 - Solas
04:31 - Romance
04:48 - New characters
05:16 - More companion abilities
05:27 - Pet the animals
05:36- New locations
06:06 - Changing appearance

#gaming #DragonAgeTheVeilguard #gamespot #DragonAge #DragonAgeVeilguard
title: 24 Cool Things We Saw In Our Dragon Age: The Veilguard Preview

description: Helldivers 2 recent Patch 1.001.100 and Chemical Agents Premium Warbond have made a lot of fantastic improvements to the game. Both chemical warfare and flamethrowers are strong and viable options, especially against Charger variants. In this video let’s explore why you’d take the TX-41 Sterilizer Stratagem and Gas Grenades over flame weapons. We’ll also show you how to build a Roach Motel to fight the Terminids using a Shield Generator Relay.
title: Chemicals Are Good Now In Helldivers 2

description: Our first look at Majima in the live-action Like a Dragon: Yakuza.
title: Live-Action Majima in Like a Dragon: Yakuza

description:

description:

The game releases February 28th, 2025.
